name: #1 Princess Puzzle Games - Play dress up in the palace
name_original: #1 Princess Puzzle Games - Play dress up in the palace
description:
Help the Princess heroes mix and match gems to save the kingdom!

▶ MUCH easier than other matching games!
▶ Unlock powerful items for FREE!
▶ Over 700+ levels - with more added each week!
▶ HD graphics and explosive effects!
▶ Challenge friends and other players through Game Center!
▶ Sync your progress on Game Center and play on any device!

Download for FREE! *Limited time only*


●●●Now available on iPhone and iPad!!●●●
